headline.main: ITALY INCREASING EFFORT IN GREECE; Propaganda Assuring Italian Protection Is Thought Move to Offset Nazi Activity PEACE SAID TO BE CERTAIN Foreign Circles Believe That Dictator May Have Entered Secret Pact With Rome

lead_paragraph: BELGRADE, Yugoslavia, June 1 --According to information reaching here from Athens, German agents have shown increased activity in Greece within the last few days. Propaganda has been disseminated even more widely than heretofore and the staff of the German legation has been substantially augmented.
